column4: I seem to have a apache permission problem. my php script tries to require_once some files and I get "Warning: Unknown: failed to open stream: Permission denied in Unknown on line 0 Fatal error: Unknown: Failed opening required". Thanks in advance
why is that a permissions problem ?
I don't know. I guess it is? :P
I'd suggest debugging the script
I'd suggest talking to the dreamcms people about how to set it up on ubuntu
well then I have to talk to myself :P
or reading the documentation on how to setup Dream CMS
why ? is this your application ?
yes :P http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_zaSMB_LtyI
so this is your application that you've written, but you have no idea how to install it or set it up ?
it's not an apache problem
you've not setup the enviornment
I'm concerned you don't know how to setup your own application that you've written
dreamCMS works fine. if I create a php file named cake.php and type require_once cake2.php I get errors. permission errors.
if it works fine, why is it complaining it can't find sourced files
and again - I'm concerned you don't know how to set your own application up
i'm not setting up dreamcms. I'm setting up apache >.<
apache is setup
the files you are setting up are you own application files
don't need to use the tool
yes, because you are not creating the files correctly
